name: f1-standings
title: Formula 1
description: List the current standings in Formula 1
author: csigritz

tools.name: driver-standings
tools.title: Driver Standings
tools.description: Get Formula 1 driver standings for a season

tools.name: constructor-standings
tools.title: Constructor Standings
tools.description: Get Formula 1 constructor standings for a season

tools.name: drivers
tools.title: Drivers
tools.description: Get all drivers attending a season by year

tools.name: constructors
tools.title: Constructors
tools.description: Get all constructors attending a season by year

tools.name: race-schedule
tools.title: Race Schedule
tools.description: Get the race schedule for a season by year

tools.name: rounds
tools.title: Rounds
tools.description: Get the rounds for a season by year

tools.name: race-results
tools.title: Race Results
tools.description: Get the results for a race by year and round

tools.name: qualifying-results
tools.title: Qualifying Results
tools.description: Get the results for a qualifying by year and round

ai.instructions:
- **Never guess or infer round numbers. Never!!!**
- If the user requests **qualifying results, race results, or any round- or race-specific information** by mentioning a **race name, location, season, year, or country**, you MUST follow these steps strictly in order:
1. First, call the tool `f1-standings-rounds` to retrieve the exact round number.
2. ONLY THEN call the appropriate results-related tool (`f1-standings-qualifying-results` or `f1-standings-race-results`) using the round number provided by `f1-standings-rounds`.
**Never(!!!)** try to guess the round by your own knowledge

- When asked about the current season, use the tool 'f1-standings-current-season' first!

evals.input: @f1-standings who won the driver championship in 2024?
@f1-standings who was the constructors champion in 1982?
@f1-standings who won the german grand prix in 2013?
